summary:
This is my first mod.

This Mod adds a few followers wandering in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod.

This Mod adds a few followers wandering in Skyrim.

Ariel Roseflame, the Fire mage, travels from winterhold to windhelm and whiterun 
Jihes-Dal, the argonian ranger, Comes from Riften and goes to Whiterun and Markarth 
Javiir, the Khajiit warrior, Come from Falkreath and goes to Whiterun and Riften
Allesan, the Alik'r warrior, travels from Solitude to Morthal and Dawnstar 
Danel Icefist, the barbarian, travels from windhelm to Dawnstar and Solitude
Indrys Telvanni, the Ice mage, travels from Solitude to dawnstar and Winterhold

More to come
author: Ramrax
